79405.summary: Some customers in the City Park area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79405.title: June 30 - Saskatoon (City Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

79407.summary: Some customers in the Franklin area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79407.title: June 30 - Calgary (Franklin) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
